duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare food items for all restaurant and/or room service meals, hiring, training, scheduling, and directing restaurant culinary and kitchen staff.
Visually inspect all food products to be served to ensure they meet the quality standards set out by departmental and resort management.
Ensure the cleanliness, sanitation, and safety in the kitchen, and storage areas while minimizing waste and maximizing cost/production ratio.

education_certification.credential: 3+ years of experience in a high-volume, full-service restaurant, production kitchen is preferred. State or local law may require a certificate upon completion of state-certified proper food handling certification. ServSafe® certification and/or Spanish is a plus.
